message_1: What is the Rail fence cipher of the message "HELLO WORLD" when using three rails?
message_2:
To encode the message "HELLO WORLD" using the Rail Fence cipher with three rails, we arrange the letters in a zigzag pattern along three lines, and then read the letters from left to right along each line.

Here's the arrangement:

H . . . O . . . R . . .
. E . L . W . L . D .
. . L . . . O . . . .

Now, we read the letters from left to right along each line:

HOR ELWLDO LLO

So, the Rail Fence cipher of the message "HELLO WORLD" with three rails is "HORELWLLO".
